Fitting
Slim

Wash care
Machine wash cold at 30 degrees with like colours
Do not bleach
Wash and dry inside out
Hang to dry in shade
Medium iron

Team this with chinos or jeans and sneakers.

product_display_name: Inkfruit Mens Chain Reaction T-shirt
description:
1. 100% cotton

This t-shirt depicts the typical Indian-ness which cannot be found anywhere in the world. This is India and people live in unconditional harmony in this land.

Those nice fabrics, the cool colours, the easy and relaxed Fit are few of the things that come to mind when one thinks of t-shirts. Be it little kids, college goers, the not-so-young or the oldies, everybody loves t-shirts. The perfect casual wear ever created by man. So easy to wear and comfortable. The popularity of t-shirts is soaring and it so seems a life without a t-shirt is unthinkable for some. It's a no holds barred addiction people just can't get rid of. The multitude of colours, designs, fits and sizes that t-shirts come in are a tribute to the the astounding craze for t-shirts. The eternal favourite for one and all. Go for your t-shirts right away.

product_display_name: Fabindia Men Striped Green Shirt
description:

Green shirt with blue stripes, has a spread collar, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, full front buttoned placket

Fit
Regular

Wash care
Hand wash separately in cold water using mild detergent
Certain fabrics may bleed or shrink
Dry in shade
Do not soak
This unique fabric has been dyed/ printed using traditional dyeing processes. Some colours may initially transfer when in dry or wet contact with light coloured fabrics or upholstery. This transfer will reduce after a few washes but we recommend that you wash the product separately for the first few washes.

fabindia specialises in natural, craft-based contemporary pieces, while also providing rural craft persons a platform to use traditional dyeing and fabric printing techniques. With the essence of Indian roots, crafted with a focus on the traditional, this stylish shirt sets the tone for an all-new trend for men. Wear this with denims or chinos.

product_display_name: Timberland Unisex Rubber Sole Brush Shoe Accessories
description:
This handy brush is an essential tool for taking care of nubuck leather footwear. It erases stains and brushes away dirt from suede, nubuck, leather and canvas. One side features a gum rubber eraser and the other a nylon bristle brush all molded in the shape of a timberland boot outsole.

Method of application

  • Use the brush side to remove loose dirt or dried mud
  • The gum rubber side is for erasing stubborn dirt and stains
  • Then use the brush side to raise the nap
  • 3¼ inches in length

product_display_name: Clarks Men Hang Work Leather Black Formal Shoes
description:
A perfect formal shoe, this smart Hang Work slip-on leather shoe offers absolute relaxed comfort. With a soft leather and fabric inner lining, rounded toe and raised stitch detailing, this shoe is a great addition to your wardrobe.

Upper
Full grain leather upper in a slip-on style for absolute comfort
Decorative strap over the tongue for midfoot support and style
Raised stitch detailing for durability and style
Rounded toe for easy movement of the toes within the shoe
Mildly padded collar for comfort
Has a generous G-width fitting
Part leather, part textile inner lining for abrasion-free wear

Midsole
Man-made EVA midsole for lightweight comfort
Soft leather footbed for cuhsioned, all-day comfort

Outsole
Durable textured rubber outsole with suction grooves throughout the forefoot and grooves on the heel in a horse shoe shape for absolute grip and traction
Flex grooves in the forefoot for flexible movement
Curved midfoot for inner-arch support
Raised heel for ergonomic comfort and style

Shoe care
Wipe surface with dry, clean cloth to remove dust
Brush using a branded leather conditioner to restore shoe shine
Do not store in direct sunlight

Indulge the new-to-the-world feel of your little boy in this check shirt and khakhi shorts combo from gini and jony. Team this with the super comfy shorts and crocs footwear for happy, casual outings with your little one, while the pure cotton fabric stays soft on his skin and keeps him fresh and comfortable all day.
